brand_personality.tone: Professional meets playful - serious AI with a smile
target_audience: Anyone intimidated by complex AI platforms

visual_concepts.description: Minimalist banana silhouette with circuit board/neural network pattern inside. Clean, modern, hints at AI without being cliché robot.
Letters N and B intertwined with neural network nodes. Abstract, sophisticated, memorable.
visual_concepts.symbolism: Integration of brand initials with AI visualization

visual_concepts.description: Stylized banana shape formed by microchip/processor elements. Small geometric chips arranged in banana curve.
Simplified banana with subtle smile, brain/neural pattern texture. Friendly AI personification.

color_palettes.name: Vibrant Banana Tech
color_palettes.reasoning: Perfect balance: playful yellow, serious tech purple, fresh accent

color_palettes.name: Neon Banana
color_palettes.reasoning: More playful, less professional - use if targeting creative/fun audience only

color_palettes.name: Sophisticated Banana
color_palettes.reasoning: More premium feel, less playful - use if targeting enterprise

typography.treatment: Consider slight curve/arc in wordmark (banana shape)
typography.case: Lowercase preferred (more approachable) or Title Case

do: Include subtle tech/AI elements (circuits, nodes, neural patterns)
dont: Avoid looking like food delivery app
Don't make it too silly (still selling AI tech)
Avoid generic AI clichés (robot heads, circuit brains)

formats: Social media (1200x630 OG image, profile sizes)
technical_requirements.clear_space: Minimum clear space = height of the letter 'n' in nano on all sides

concept_1_nano_banana_bot.prompt: Modern logo design for 'Nano Banana AI', an AI platform. Design: Minimalist banana silhouette filled with geometric circuit board pattern and neural network nodes. Style: Flat design, geometric, professional yet playful. Colors: Golden yellow #FFD700, electric indigo #6366F1, fresh green #10B981 accents. Typography: Bold modern sans-serif 'Nano Banana AI' in charcoal. Inspiration: Stripe meets Duolingo - professional fun. No gradients, clean vector style, scalable. --v 6 --style raw --ar 1:1
concept_1_nano_banana_bot.negative_prompt: no cartoons, no realistic banana, no 3D effects, no shadows, no clipart, no food delivery aesthetic

concept_2_abstract_nb.prompt: Abstract geometric logo for 'Nano Banana AI'. Design: Letters N and B artfully intertwined with AI neural network nodes, forming unified symbol. Style: Minimalist line art, geometric abstraction, sophisticated. Colors: Golden yellow #FFD700 primary, electric indigo #6366F1 for neural nodes. Modern sans-serif wordmark below. Professional but memorable. Vector style, flat design, no gradients. --v 6 --style raw --ar 1:1
concept_2_abstract_nb.negative_prompt: no literal banana, no complex illustrations, no 3D, no shadows

concept_3_chip_banana.prompt: Logo for 'Nano Banana AI', AI tech platform. Design: Stylized banana curve formed by tiny microchip/processor geometric shapes arranged in banana form. Style: Tech-minimal, modern, geometric fusion. Colors: Golden yellow #FFD700 chips, indigo #6366F1 background or accents. Clean wordmark in bold sans-serif. Scalable vector art, flat design. Innovation meets approachability. --v 6 --style raw --ar 1:1
concept_3_chip_banana.negative_prompt: no realistic banana, no food photography, no complex 3D, no busy patterns

concept_4_smiling_banana.prompt: Friendly logo for 'Nano Banana AI'. Design: Simple banana icon with subtle smile, filled with abstract neural network pattern texture. Style: Friendly minimal, approachable AI. Colors: Warm golden yellow #FFD700, electric indigo #6366F1 neural patterns, fresh green #10B981 accent. Rounded sans-serif 'Nano Banana AI' wordmark. Duolingo-style friendly but professional. Flat design, vector art. --v 6 --style raw --ar 1:1
concept_4_smiling_banana.negative_prompt: no cartoonish banana, no overly childish, no detailed illustration, no gradients

stable_diffusion.base_prompt: Professional logo design, Nano Banana AI, AI platform, minimalist banana icon with tech elements, golden yellow #FFD700, electric indigo #6366F1, modern sans-serif typography, flat design, vector art, geometric style, professional playful, scalable, white background, centered composition

parameters.negative_prompt: realistic, 3D render, photograph, gradient, shadow, cartoon clipart, complex, busy, illegible text, distorted, blurry

context_testing: Test on colored backgrounds (yellow, purple, teal)
Test in browser tab alongside competitors
Test in mobile app icon grid

brand_strategy.positioning: The fun, approachable AI platform that doesn't compromise on power
differentiation: Playful branding in serious AI space (stand out)
Approachable for beginners, powerful for pros

competitive_landscape.serious_ai_brands: OpenAI (serious, blue), Google AI (corporate, multi-color), Microsoft Azure AI (enterprise, blue)
competitive_landscape.playful_ai_brands: Anthropic Claude (orange, friendly), Hugging Face (yellow, emoji), Midjourney (abstract, colorful)
competitive_landscape.positioning_strategy: Between serious and playful - professional fun, like Duolingo or Slack in the AI space

options.process: 1) Generate multiple concepts with DALL-E/Midjourney, 2) Select best, 3) Hire designer on Fiverr/Upwork to vectorize and refine
Post brief, receive 20-50 concepts, select winner

options.best_for: Full brand identity, premium result, serious launch
options.process: 1) Discovery call, 2) Concepts, 3) Refinement, 4) Full brand guidelines

options.caveat: Plan to rebrand with professional later

budget_recommendations.recommended: AI Generation + Designer Refinement for MVP, upgrade to Professional Designer after product-market fit

must_have: Professional enough for B2B, playful enough for B2C
Scalable across all mediums (web, mobile, print)
nice_to_have: Animation potential (bouncing banana, pulsing AI nodes)

next_steps: 1. Clarify Nano Banana AI's specific purpose/features
3. Generate initial concepts using AI prompts above
6. Hire designer to vectorize and create all variations

additional_notes.name_analysis: Nano Banana AI is memorable due to: 1) Alliteration (Nano/Banana), 2) Unexpected combination (tech + fruit), 3) Inherently playful while 'AI' adds seriousness, 4) Short, pronounceable, searchable
additional_notes.trademark_check: IMPORTANT: Search USPTO, EUIPO, and domain availability before finalizing design
additional_notes.mascot_potential: Consider developing animated banana character for marketing (similar to Duolingo owl, Mailchimp chimp)

file_metadata.for: AI image generation services + designer handoff
